divs: Sighting DetailsI took my dog outside to go to the bathroom and I noticed a very bright largelight in the western sky. when my dog took note of it he raised his hackles. Iremained stationary, and is still there 12 am hour later. Any information youcould provide would be helpful. I have 3 digital pictures of the object that Ican provide if needed.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Munster
There were no other sightings in Munster on or around April 5th 2004
Summary: Saw a bright light in the western Sky
